body_html:
raghavgurbaxani@ the first argument to save_model is the model instance itself and the second argument (i.e "filepath" parameter) is the path where you want to save the file, e.g: "Desktop/model.h5". Here is a link to where the call is defined.
Can you try this change and see if you still get an error?

Can you try this change and see if you still get an error?
body:
raghavgurbaxani@ the first argument to save_model is the model instance itself and the second argument (i.e "filepath" parameter) is the path where you want to save the file, e.g: "Desktop/model.h5".  [Here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/keras/engine/saving.py#L51) is a link to where the call is defined.
Can you try this change and see if you still get an error?
